name: LOML
greetingText: I don't know how to say this, but ...
wishText: I hope you like this gift! ;)
text2: Kak Bintang, a man who has become the melody of my life.
text3: Today is not just any day; it's the day you, the incredible man who has stolen my heart, were brought into this world.
text5: On this day, I wish for you all the happiness in the world. May your dreams take flight and your aspirations come to fruition. May the coming year be filled with new adventures, opportunities for growth, and moments of pure bliss.
text6Entry: You deserve nothing less than the ...
outroText: May this day be as incredible as you are. Here's to celebrating the wonderful, inspiring, and utterly lovable person that you areâ€”a person who has enriched my life in ways words can only attempt to convey.
replayText: With all my love and a thousand birthday kisses, Aya!
